price: Nígbà tí wọ́n bá sọ fún wọn pé kí wọ́n kírun, wọn kò níí kírun.
arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱرۡكَعُواْ لَا يَرۡكَعُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā qīla lahumu ir'kaʿū lā yarkaʿūna
